title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document project requirements for the DistributedGraphProcessingEngine. Identify key features, performance goals (e.g., processing large-scale graph data with low latency), and any specific integration points (e.g., with social network APIs or existing data storage systems).

title: Design Architecture for DistributedGraphProcessingEngine
description: Create an architectural design for the engine, detailing how it will scale across a distributed cluster and interact with large-scale graph data.

title: Develop Core Graph Algorithms for the Engine
description: Implement core graph algorithms such as PageRank, Shortest Paths, Clustering, etc., that will be part of the DistributedGraphProcessingEngine.

title: Develop User Interface and APIs for the Engine
description: Create a user-friendly interface and APIs to interact with the engine, allowing users to submit graph data and retrieve results.

title: Set Up Database Structure for Storing Graph Data
description: Design and implement the database structure needed to store large-scale graph data efficiently.

title: Perform Unit and Integration Tests
description: Write unit tests and integration tests to ensure the engine functions correctly and efficiently.
dependencies: Develop Core Graph Algorithms for the Engine
Develop User Interface and APIs for the Engine
Set Up Database Structure for Storing Graph Data

title: Perform Performance Testing and Optimization
description: Test the performance of the engine with large-scale graph data and optimize it for efficiency.

title: Deploy the DistributedGraphProcessingEngine to a Production Environment
description: Prepare the engine for deployment to a production environment, ensuring scalability, reliability, and security.
